html:
7.13.20  3:40 am   bill, i want to do so many different things. If I learn all of them at once I will be like a jack of all trades but master of none. Is this a good idea?

     if you can get them to work together then you can be a master of something special

     Or should I focus on one skill at a time?

     unfortunately it may feel like that sometimes, but if you keep good logs you can probably keep it on track for the long run

     Or am I thinking about this all wrong?

     i think you should discuss it a little further while also surveying the local geography of your immediate planet

7.13.20  3:31 am   So do you just spew words and sound onto paper?

     i used to do that, but now i use a combination of text files and small video recordings

     Because I love it!

7.13.20  3:04 am   is society a joke?

      no but it might be a pun

7.13.20  2:44 am   How did you get good at music?

      it has always been irresistible to me

7.13.20  2:36 am   If I can play piano and want to learn guitar, how do I stop being frustrated by the dichotomy of the theory and language directly translating between instruments, but the mechanics not at all?

      i'm not sure. i feel like learning guitar is a life long project

7.13.20  1:48 am   Will you ever consider streaming on twitch?

      of course

7.13.20  1:40 am   when will you post a new video?

      every tuesday

7.13.20  1:19 am   what are you working on right now?

      videomaking

7.13.20  1:18 am   What's the topic of the project you're working on

      production

7.13.20  1:02 am   can you do that one thing thats like really cool and makes people go like WOAHH like you know what i mean so can you do that?

      yes, working on it now

7.13.20  12:47 am   whats a line in one of ur songs that you really like

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.13.20  12:37 am   My favorite restaurant is Waffle House, what's wrong with me?

      maybe you don't have air conditioning in your house so you have to go there for the air conditioning

7.12.20  11:36 pm   Your stuck on and island and you can only bring 3 things. What would you bring?

      a boat, a plane, and a space ship. wait, i just re-read the question, and now i realize that it says i'm already on the island, and i can bring 3 things, presumably somewhere else. so then i will take a plant sample, and sand sample, and a rock sample. unless there is treasure in which case i would take the treasure instead

7.12.20  11:30 pm   any advice on breaking out of verse chorus verse chorus bridge chorus? your songs have such cool structures but dont feel meandering

      you have to be like a doctor. the song is the patient... well no, the listener is like the patient. just play the song through from the beginning and see how the patient is doing. see what you need to do

7.12.20  11:20 pm   are u still too small for the mall?

      what the heck is a mall

7.12.20  11:20 pm   What font is the font used when asking an euqstion

      your browser's default font

7.12.20  11:09 pm   how tf do you make your videos so funny and amazing cuz like damn

      the trick is to just make them normal. normalcy sells

7.12.20  10:58 pm   Do you miss The System or the 5-Day Schedule at all?

      5 day or 2 week, although i think i would even prefer 1 week

7.12.20  10:57 pm   dude you should do a sequel to Monday alligator kitchen

      every monday video is a sequel to the first monday video but i will do more sequels

7.12.20  10:47 pm   favorite kind of potato?

      hot

7.12.20  10:46 pm   where do you keep the Shorty Award for Best in Weird in ur house

      i don't think it ever existed. they said they would mail one to me but i don't have a mail box

7.12.20  10:33 pm   Waffles or pancakes

      ah, the classic cry of the person who has yet to discover waff cakes

7.12.20  10:28 pm   How do you seem like the most abnormal normal human?

      that is because of the extreme amount of normalcy i possess

7.12.20  10:20 pm   Why does the synth&sax riff in the second verse of your most recent song called I Love You sound so... sexy?

      if you put it in a sexual context, anything can happen

7.12.20  9:58 pm   What do you know about Sri Lanka?

      they have green taxi vans with 3 wheels

7.12.20  9:53 pm   Are you the master creator of the universe itself?

      i thought you were

7.12.20  9:43 pm   Do you think you could give us a hint to the project your working on?

      yes, i want to give you 1000 hints but i am trying to hold back so as not to be too overwhelming

7.12.20  9:24 pm   At the airport terminal, what do the planes do when they are not landing?

      just staying on the ground for a while

7.12.20  9:05 pm   What if the beatles made ambient music?

      it usually is somewhere near the end or middle of the album

7.12.20  8:56 pm   do you think you will maybe be able to sell the thing you are making for making videos? if you could make it a product then i think people would buy it. or maybe you could do a payment model where you have a price, but if anyone emails you and says "i'm too poor for it" then you give it to them for free.

      first i have to figure out if it even works. or even exists yet

7.12.20  8:41 pm   how did you come up the name "person derpsom" which you used in the outside music video

      made it up

7.12.20  8:07 pm   how did you get so darn good at playing the keyboard? it's sick (in a good way)

      you just have to develop a friendly relationship with the keyboard. and then keep growing that relationship day by day and year by year. if it's not friendly it's not gonna happen. keyboard is the friendship instrument

7.12.20  8:02 pm   can you prove how wrong the current model of physics is right now

      no but maybe if i had a little more time

7.12.20  8:00 pm   Do you prefer #11 chords or b13 chords?

      #11 chord. if it's not a #11 chord i don't wanna hear it. it's as simple as that really

7.12.20  8:00 pm   Thoughts on towels?

      you must keep them dry. dry off your towel with a towel before you use it, to make sure it is dry

7.12.20  7:51 pm   What's been going on?

      i've been learning how to do the things i do

7.12.20  7:50 pm   Are you a cow?

      no but i can see why you would think that

7.12.20  7:49 pm   Do you think you will post on YouTube the ever again?

      i'm just getting started

7.12.20  7:42 pm   what are your thoughts on clouds?

      they are surprisingly heavy

7.12.20  7:29 pm   how do i get better?

      first check to make sure you aren't already too good

7.12.20  6:59 pm   why do people make art?

      to try to explain everything

7.12.20  6:51 pm   what is overrated

      rating things

7.12.20  6:02 pm   in the video "ball and stick". you sang something like "rooling down a lonley hill" i think that peice sounds awesome, could you consider to make it into a song? - i have watched that video many times, because i like that bit so much.

      i'm pleased to say that i've considered making everything into a song. and i will do it, 1 thing at a time

7.12.20  5:49 pm   Where do you get inspiration for your songs?

      deep in the earth's core, or at least my best guess of what might be happening at the earth's core, because i can't go there right now due to coronavirus

7.12.20  5:45 pm   can you post an undisclosed amount of videos in the next few months? 

      oh hell yeah

7.12.20  5:30 pm   Can u stop the coronavirus

      i'll see what i can do

7.12.20  5:28 pm   do you go to places

      sort of, but that's been more complicated lately

7.12.20  5:06 pm   I asked a question but now I can't find it.

      was it this one

7.12.20  5:01 pm   How do I get my brain to work 

      see if you can draw a picture of it

7.12.20  4:47 pm   How do you make the lyrics to your songs?

      with music
